description: Use this type to define a parent of an animal.

parentOf.description: References the child of this parent (allowing you to build multi-generation pedigrees).

gender.description: Specifies Male or Female gender so you can recognise Sire or Dam.

relation.description: Identifies type of parent: Genetic (default), Recipient, Adoptive (Foster/Rearing).

identifier.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.
